resources.string: The mission of my organisation is to remove disparties among people by solving the mystry of God, abolish religious fanatism and establish peace in the world We are the creation of nature . The whole Universe consist of five basic elements - air , water , earth , fire and space . An old saying Yat Brahmande tat Pinde proves to be true . Our body is also made up of these five elements . The life can emerge on any planet where these five elements are present in a balanced state . It will happen only in a natural way. This process is continuing for the time immemorial . There are hundeds of galaxies and thousands of planets and stars in the universe . Matter can neither be created nor distroyed science says but changes its form . Similarly Atma changes its body after death.

EK ONKAR , an Audio cassette and CD based on Guru Nanak Dev jis Gurbani , I have taken only those Compositions which are based on Atma because my search for Truth of life is Atma Sri Bhagwat Gita is the main source of my re search.
I have converted all my albums to videos and have taken the compositions of Guru Nanak Dev , Surdas , Meera Bai and Bulleshah
